title: TDD: Build a Counter with Tests First
description: Practice TDD by writing tests before implementing a counter.
instructions: Write tests for increment, decrement, and reset. Then implement the CounterNotifier to make them pass.

hints.text: Write all tests first - they should fail initially
Implement the simplest solution that makes tests pass

commonMistakes.consequence: Tests become afterthoughts and may miss edge cases
commonMistakes.correction: Force yourself to write failing tests first
